snippet: Despite some indicators suggesting that faster economic growth is on its way, the euro zone’s proportion of jobless people was unchanged at 11.8 percent.
abstract: European Union report says European labor market remains stagnant despite signs of growth; jobless rate was 11.8 percent in March in 18 nations that share euro currency.
lead_paragraph: Despite some indicators suggesting that faster economic growth is on its way, the euro zone’s proportion of jobless people was unchanged at 11.8 percent.

headline.main: European Jobs Market Still Stagnant, March Data Show
